overview: With the concert at the Royal Theater Carr√©, a beautiful adventure came to an end, 25 sold-out theaters and 4 open-air concerts with strings and wind instruments.  The complete film that director Roderik Pattijn made of this musical trip. In the film the band members, all guest musicians but also arranger Tom Trapp talk about this special collaboration.
title: Di-Rect - De Duif sessions
